boardgame.name: Urban Sprawl
boardgame.description: From the publisher's website]:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game Overview:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Urban Sprawl is a game for 2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash;4 players. Urban Sprawl abstractly models the growth of a town into a teeming metropolis._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players assume the roles of entrepreneur, tycoon, and politician_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;each helping in the development of a hypothetical _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Anywhere, USA._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; Wealth and Prestige will be earned and spent throughout the game. Buildings will rise only to later be demolished for better and larger fare._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Throughout the game players will gather valuable Permits. These will result in either a wealthy Investment or the foundation of a new building Contract. Players will strive to become dominant in one or more building Zones in order to acquire beneficial political offices._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;All of this eventually leads to the end game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;a vibrant metropolis that is revered around the world_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;when the player with the most Prestige will be crowned the winner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game Play:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The grid of streets on the board provides the framework for building the small town. The buildings will be placed within the grid and identified with control markers (wooden cubes) to show each player's contribution to the growing urban area. Each building's value is determined by the cumulative Wealth and Prestige values of the block in which is it constructed._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the start of a player's turn he may discard one or more Building Permit cards from hand as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Investments,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; gaining Wealth in doing so. Next that player gets 6 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Action Points_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (APs) with which to spend on any of the the following activities:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Acquiring new Building Permit cards from those available to choose;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Constructing new buildings from those currently available;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Acquiring a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Favor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;a Building Contract that only that player can build._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each activity carries with it a variable cost in APs, depending on where the chosen card lies on the board._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Once a player has spent his APs it's time for a quick reset phase in readiness for the next player's turn. It is during this phase that events can occur, elections can be held for the various political offices, and players receive payouts in Wealth and Prestige. Wealth payouts provide funding for new buildings while Prestige payouts provide victory points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Generally, players will be trying to build in areas that provide better payouts. Players are also looking to construct more buildings of a particular _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;zone_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;Government, Residential, Industrial, or Commercial_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;in order to help them win an election, as the politicians each confer a special ability to the player holding the office. Many of the buildings also provide a one-time bonus as they are built, and players can benefit from construction in the right neighborhoods._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Throughout the game, the values of the buildings will generally increase as the town grows into a city and then a large metropolis. Neighborhoods that were once valuable can become run down and new city centers spring up as the urban areas sprawl out across the grid._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;When the game ends, players will conduct a final scoring of each Prestige row, earn points based on accumulated Wealth, and score bonus points for political offices held_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;after which the player with the highest Prestige total wins the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

New in Shrink. Reserved for BugLaden.

GMT Games (GMT 1116) Urban Sprawl is a game for 2-4 players. Urban Sprawl abstractly models the growth of a town into a teeming metropolis. Players assume the roles of entrepreneur, tycoon and politician—each helping in the development of a hypothetical “Anywhere, USA.” Wealth and Prestige will be earned and spent throughout the game. Buildings will rise only to later be demolished for better and larger fare. Throughout the game, players will gather valuable Permits. These will result in either a wealthy Investment or the foundation of a new building Contract. Players will strive to become dominant in one or more building Zones in order to acquire beneficial political offices. All of this eventually leads to the end game – a vibrant metropolis that is revered around the world – when the player with the most Prestige will be crowned the winner.
FOR USER Domhnall101 ONLY!
Opened but unplayed.

This is a new-in-shrink copy of Urban Sprawl. Will ship to US locations only. Shipping cost will be given at time of sale (or geekmail me with your zip code to get a more accurate amount). Assume about $9-$12 for shipping.

Played twice, but not finished either time. Liked the theme and the idea, but too chaotic for my taste. Definitely a hit for anyone who cares more about tactics and could throw strategy out the window. All parts and pieces included and bagged for your convenience. PLEASE NOTE: I had to take the insert out of the box to make everything fit properly. Upon request I will replace it, but this may lead to the lid not properly fitting to the outer rim of the box. Otherwise, I will just throw the insert out and ship it as is. Local pickup accepted for those living near New Smyrna Beach, FL. Please note this is the only option for which COD is accepted. All other customers will have their game shipped by Priority Mail unless I am instructed otherwise.
Played 3 times. In great Like New condition. All cards are sleeved and components bagged.
Never opened still in shrink wrap! Will ship via USPS priority mail.
Played once - superb condition.

GMT Games (GMT 1116)
Urban Sprawl is a game for 2-4 players. Urban Sprawl abstractly models the growth of a town into a teeming metropolis. Players assume the roles of entrepreneur, tycoon and politician—each helping in the development of a hypothetical “Anywhere, USA.” Wealth and Prestige will be earned and spent throughout the game. Buildings will rise only to later be demolished for better and larger fare.
Throughout the game, players will gather valuable Permits. These will result in either a wealthy Investment or the foundation of a new building Contract. Players will strive to become dominant in one or more building Zones in order to acquire beneficial political offices. All of this eventually leads to the end game – a vibrant metropolis that is revered around the world – when the player with the most Prestige will be crowned the winner.

English version. All items are new and in shrink if so delivered by the producer. All items are really on stock. No fake set-up here. No Order on demand. International Customers, Please ask for our precise shipping costs. We ship only fully insured. So ordering only a small pocket game or anything very low priced may come out to be very uneconomical. Methods of payment: -You can always pick the game up at our storage location :-) -We accept all credit cards ! -You can use paypal. (That should be the first choice for non-EU customers) Für unsere deutschsprachigen Kunden: Sie können uns für alle Fragen gerne telefonisch kontaktieren: Tel.: 0201-786877 Die Versandkosten innerhalb Deutschlands betragen 5,- Euro (inkl. 19% Mwst.). Ab 100€ versenden wir innerhalb Deutschlands Versandkostenfrei. Alle Preise enthalten die gesetzliche Mehrwertsteuer in Höhe von 19%. Bezahlmöglichkeiten für Kunden innerhalb Deutschlands: - Alle Kreditkarten willkommen ! - Paypal - Vorkasse - Rechnung (Nicht für Erstbesteller, wir behalten uns vor die Zahlungsmöglichkeit per Rechnung von Fall zu Fall neu zu bewerten !)
Alternativ ist natürlich auch eine Abholung mit Bar-, EC-, oder Kreditkartenzahlung in unserem Lager möglich. (Im Geschäft wird neben Brettspielen auch eine üppige Auswahl an Rollenspielen angeboten.) Beachten Sie bitte auch unsere Aktionen und weiter Angebote auf: www. fanen.com Widerrufsbelehrung Widerrufsrecht Sie können Ihre Vertragserklärung innerhalb von zwei Wochen ohne Angabe von Gründen in Textform (z. B. Brief oder E-Mail), oder durch Rücksendung der Sache widerrufen. Die Frist beginnt frühestens mit Erhalt dieser Belehrung. Zur Wahrung der Widerrufsfrist genügt die rechtzeitige Absendung des Widerrufs oder der Sache. Der Widerruf ist zu richten an: Fantasy En_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Counter c/o Holger Willert Gudulastr. 5 D(Hofgebäude rechts hinten) 45131 Essen email: fanen@fanen.com Widerrufsfolgen Im Falle eines wirksamen Widerrufs sind die beiderseits empfangenen Leistungen zurückzugewähren. Können Sie uns die empfangene Leistung ganz oder teilweise nicht oder nur in verschlechtertem Zustand zurückgewähren, müssen Sie uns insoweit ggf. Wertersatz leisten. Bei der Überlassung von Sachen gilt dies nicht, wenn die Verschlechterung der Sache ausschließlich auf deren Prüfung - wie sie Ihnen etwa im Ladengeschäft möglich gewesen wäre - zurückzuführen ist. Im Übrigen können Sie die Wertersatzpflicht vermeiden, indem Sie die Sache nicht wie ein Eigentümer in Gebrauch nehmen und alles unterlassen, was deren Wert beeinträchtigt. Sie haben die Kosten der Rücksendung zu tragen, w enn die gelieferte Ware der bestellten entspricht und wenn der Preis der zurückzusendenden Sache einen Betrag von 40 Euro nicht übersteigt, oder wenn Sie bei einem höheren Preis der Sache zum Zeitpunkt des Widerrufs noch nicht die Gegenleistung, oder eine vertraglich vereinbarte Teilzahlung erbracht haben. Anderenfalls ist die Rücksendung für Sie kostenfrei. Nicht paketversandfähige Sachen werden bei Ihnen abgeholt. Verpflichtungen zur Erstattung von Zahlungen müssen Sie innerhalb von 30 Tagen nach Absendung Ihrer Widerrufserklärung erfüllen. Ende der Widerrufsbelehrung

*** With every sale we donate a percentage to the Veterans Support Foundation (including this sale). *** Wargame Depot has donated over $8,000 to this wonderful cause thanks, largely, to the wonderful Boardgamegeek community. Thank you so much for your continued support of Wargame Depot which has allowed us to give generously to the VSF. Mint, in shrink copy available. No dings, no dents, or anything wrong with the game. Non-smoking environment and kept in a humidity-controlled location. $13 shipping to US - write me for a quote to the rest of the world. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m the owner of Wargame Depot so a purchase from me will always be packed professionally and I can accept Paypal, MO/Check, or MC/Visa/Discover/AMEX. And if you want this game plus anything else that I am selling on BGG, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll of course be happy to add other items on in order to save you on shipping! North Carolina residents pay 7% sales tax. Cheers, Jason
